title: UNDP launches project to combat predatory starfish in Turkish waters
description: The United Nations Development Program (UNDP) has initiated a project to combat the invasion of predatory Atlantic starfish in Turkish seas, including the Marmara and Black Sea, posing a threat to marine biodiversity.
